name: Unarmed Strike

specialActions.name: Grapple
specialActions.description: You can use your Unarmed Strike to grapple a creature. The target must be no more than one size larger than you and within your reach.

onSuccess.details: The target has the Grappled condition. The grapple's escape DC equals 8 + the grappler's Strength modifier + the grappler's Proficiency Bonus.

rules.movementWhileGrappling: When you move, you can drag or carry the Grappled creature with you, but your Speed is halved unless the creature is two or more sizes smaller than you.
endConditions: The target is moved outside the grappler's reach by an effect (such as being hurled by the Thunderwave spell)

specialActions.name: Shove
specialActions.description: You can use your Unarmed Strike to shove a creature. The target must be no more than one size larger than you and within your reach.

options.name: Push
options.effect: You push the target 5 feet away from you in a direction of your choice.

options.name: Knock Prone
options.effect: The target has the Prone condition.

notes: An Unarmed Strike is a melee attack that involves using your body to damage, grapple, or shove a target within 5 feet of you. Your bonus to hit equals your Strength modifier + your Proficiency Bonus. On a hit you deal 1 + your Strength modifier in Bludgeoning damage.
